board_members_list.name: Garrett Tieng
board_members_list.description: Garrett Tieng is a junior at Case Western Reserve University, studying aerospace and mechanical engineering. He joined in November 2017 as teacher and was promoted to lead instructor before becoming vice president in June 2018. Garrett helped develop several early in-person curricula including Lego Builders, Lego Robotics, and Arduino Explorers curricula. He led the development of online curricula as well, including Code.org, Python, and Scratch. Outside of Robotics for All, Garrett was a co-captain of an internationally awarded Botball robotics team. In his free time, Garrett enjoys exercising, playing table-top games, and writing stories. Garrett.tieng.net

board_members_list.name: Jack Wang
board_members_list.description: Jack Wang is a senior at Mission San Jose High School. He joined Robotics For All in June 2020 as a teacher's assistant, and later became a lead instructor for the Python course. In December of 2021, he became the CFO. In his free time, he enjoys studying for physics competitions and watching anime.

board_members_list.name: Crystal Lee
board_members_list.description: Crystal Lee is a current junior and lives in the Bay Area. She joined Robotics For all as an intern in 2020, and in November of 2020 she became the Director of Publicity. Outside of publicity, she also heads the curriculum partnership initiative. Her other interests include volleyball, fashion design, and yearbook.

board_members_list.name: Kenneth Meng
board_members_list.description: Kenneth Meng is an sophmore at Purdue University. He joined Robotics For All in January 2019 as a teacher, and became a board member in March 2020. He was appointed as the Director of Curriculum in July 2020. In his free time, he enjoys baking, cooking, and playing Stardew Valley.

board_members_list.name: Victoria Tsai
board_members_list.description: Victoria Tsai is a senior at Atholton High School in Clarksville, MD. She joined Robotics for All as a teacher in 2020. She is also the Founder and President of Crafts for Charity and serves as a CFC Representative. Victoria also serves on the publicity committee as Director of Graphic Design. She enjoys making arts and crafts, participating in Science Olympiad and engineering!
board_members_list.title_pronouns: Director of Coordination and Crafts for Charity Representative (she/her)
